Caption: To the left, Prof. B. Sengupto gives away the degrees. A graduand bows down to dignitaries at the dais
Description: Chief Guest Mr. M.C. Chagla is seen in the middle, to his left: Dr. A.L. Mudaliar (Vice Chancellor, University of Madras), Dr. Rajah Sir Muthaiah Chettiar (Pro-Chancellor, Annamalai University), Mr. Akbar Alikhan (Member of Parliament, Andhra Pradesh), Dr. Y. Nayudamma (Director, Central Leather Research Institute, Madras), Mr. A.A. Rahim (M.L.A.). A total of 115 B.Tech. degrees and 3 Ph.D. degrees were awarded in the Second Convocation. While this Convocation housed the second set of B.Tech scholars who graduated, it is to be noted that it also had the first set of Ph.D. scholars earning their degrees.
